title: Define Project Requirements and Goals
description: Clearly outline the objectives of the DistributedGenomeSequencingPipeline, including performance expectations, scalability requirements, input/output formats, and expected results.

title: Design Architecture of the Pipeline
description: Create a high-level design for the pipeline, detailing how data will flow through the system, which components are required, and their interdependencies.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for Data Submission
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for submitting genome sequencing data, with features for uploading files, monitoring progress, and downloading results.

title: Implement Backend Components for Data Processing
description: Develop the necessary backend components to process the incoming genome sequencing data, including parallelization and load balancing mechanisms.

title: Develop Scalable Data Storage Solutions
description: Create a scalable data storage solution that can handle massive amounts of genome sequencing data, ensuring fast access and minimal downtime.

title: Implement Distributed Computing Solutions
description: Integrate distributed computing solutions for handling large-scale data processing tasks across a cluster, ensuring efficient and parallel execution.

title: Implement Analysis and Visualization Tools
description: Develop tools for analyzing genome sequencing data, including variant calling, annotation, and visualization.

title: Define Project Requirements and Goals - RFC Review
description: Clearly outline the objectives of the DistributedGenomeSequencingPipeline, including performance expectations (e.g., processing speed, concurrency, memory usage), scalability requirements (e.g., number of nodes, data distribution strategies), input/output formats (e.g., FASTQ, VCF), and expected results (e.g., variant calling, gene prediction). Consider the use cases, potential bottlenecks, and future expansions.

title: Document System Architecture and Usage
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system architecture, as well as instructions for using the pipeline.
dependencies: Implement Frontend Interface for Data Submission
Implement Backend Components for Data Processing
